# center

**Instance Property**

The center point of the item’s frame rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var center: NSPoint { get set }
```

## Configuring position

- **frame**: The frame rectangle, which describes the item’s location and size in its section’s coordinate system.
- **bounds**: The bounds rectangle, which describes the item’s location and size in its own coordinate system.

items.description: The frame rectangle, which describes the item’s location and size in its section’s coordinate system.
